# wameicheckr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of wameicheckr is to check Japanese neme (wamei) of plant species. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of wameicheckr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("matutosi/wameicheckr")
```

## Example

You can see examples from vignette.
